Chances - Class in general

changeTab(int, int) - Method in class views.ArmorView

Chat - Class in views
Chat is used to display game status messages and exchange text messages between players.
Chat(String, int, int, GameContainer) - Constructor for class views.Chat
Constructs a Chat passing its origin's position as single x and y coordinates in tile numbers.
Chat(String, Point, GameContainer) - Constructor for class views.Chat
Constructs a Chat passing its origin's position as a point in tile numbers.
Chat(String, int, int, int, int, GameContainer) - Constructor for class views.Chat
Constructs a Chat passing its origin's position as single x and y coordinates in tile numbers and the dimension of its superclass View as single x and y coordinates in pixels.
Chat(String, Point, Dimension, GameContainer) - Constructor for class views.Chat
Constructs a Chat passing its origin's position as a Point in tile numbers and the dimension of its superclass View as a Dimension in pixels.
